snippet: North Korea said on Monday it will send cheerleaders along with its athletes to the Asian Games in the South as a gesture of peace after weeks of firing rockets and fiery rhetoric....

headline.print_headline: Bellicose North Korea Lightens Up With Promise of Cheerleaders
headline.main: Bellicose North Korea Lightens Up With Promise of Cheerleaders

lead_paragraph: North Korea said on Monday it will send cheerleaders along with its athletes to the Asian Games in the South as a gesture of peace after weeks of firing rockets and fiery rhetoric.
